${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Advance.NAME: Cash Advance
${modID}:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

${modID}:AllIn.NAME: All In
${modID}:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You cannot gain Block from cards next turn.

${modID}:Gamble.NAME: Risky Investment
${modID}:Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 Gold. NL If you win next turn, gain !M! Gold.

${modID}:Advantage.NAME: Gain Advantage
${modID}:Advantage.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 *Advantage for each *Die in your hand.
${modID}:Advantage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 1 *Advantage for each *Die in your hand.

${modID}:CursedDie.NAME: Cursed Die
${modID}:CursedDie.DESCRIPTION: 1/6 chance to permanently remove a *Cursed *Die from your deck when played. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SunkCost.NAME: Sunk Cost
${modID}:SunkCost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Permanently increase this card's Block or damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
${modID}:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: *Die Rolls are 1 for 2 turns. NL Gain 1 *Buffer. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:SnakeEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Die Rolls are 1 for 2 turns. NL Gain 1 *Buffer.

${modID}:RedKing.NAME: Red King
${modID}:RedKing.DESCRIPTION: *Red *Dice now damage ALL enemies. NL Add !M! *Red *Dice to your hand.

${modID}:Desperation.NAME: Desperation
${modID}:Desperation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Increase the cost of ALL cards in hand by 1 this turn.
${modID}:Desperation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Increase the cost of ALL cards in hand by 1 this turn. NL (Up to 2)

${modID}:DoubleDealing.NAME: Double-Dealing
${modID}:DoubleDealing.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards. NL Swap their cost this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FatesHand.NAME: Fate's Hand
${modID}:FatesHand.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2. NL If the discarded cards had the same cost, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:TrickstersMark.NAME: Trickster's Mark
${modID}:TrickstersMark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to random enemies.

${modID}:LuckyBreak.NAME: Lucky Break
${modID}:LuckyBreak.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 Cards. NL If they have the same cost, gan !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:DoubleDown.NAME: Double Down
${modID}:DoubleDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you end your turn with !B! or less block, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ChaosFour.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosFour.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosFive.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosFive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact and 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosSix.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosSix.DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! cards this turn are played twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosForm.NAME: Chaos Form
${modID}:ChaosForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, roll a *Chaos *Die.

${modID}:Fold.NAME: Fold
${modID}:Fold.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn. NL End your turn. NL

${modID}:LuckOfTheDraw.NAME: Luck of the Draw
${modID}:LuckOfTheDraw.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, randomly gain 1 Block or deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:CardShark.NAME: Card Shark
${modID}:CardShark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this is the leftmost card in your hand, it costs 0 and deals double damage.

${modID}:BlazingTactics.NAME: Blazing Tactics
${modID}:BlazingTactics.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . If you have more energy than cards in hand, draw !M! cards. Otherwise, Exhaust.

${modID}:Call.NAME: Call
${modID}:Call.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Attack: deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Skill: apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Power: gain [E] [E].
${modID}:Call.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Attack: deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Skill: apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Power: gain [E] [E] [E].

${modID}:Bluff.NAME: Bluff
${modID}:Bluff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have no debuffs, gain !B! Block.
${modID}:Bluff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have 1 or less debuffs, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:FoolsFortune.NAME: Fool's Fortune
${modID}:FoolsFortune.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with no Attacks in hand, gain !B! Block and [E] next turn.

${modID}:DeadlyWager.NAME: Deadly Wager
${modID}:DeadlyWager.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. At the start of your turn, lose 3 HP
